content:
I think I've got all the tips I need for blocking my lace shawl. Thank you so much for your help! I feel more confident now about adding beads to my shawl and blocking it properly. You've been a huge help!

I think I'll get started on adding beads to my shawl now. I'll experiment with different bead placements and see what looks best. And when I'm ready to block my shawl, I'll follow your tips to get it looking its best.

Thanks again for your help and guidance. You've been amazing!
